alert.note: Alert for Aguada; Anasco; Lares; Las Marias; Moca; Rincon; San Sebastian (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 09 at 3:33PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aguada, Anasco, Lares, Las Marias, Moca, Rincon and San Sebastian. * WHEN...Until 545 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 233 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Sebastian, Anasco, Las Marias, Moca, Lares, Aguada, Aguadilla, Rincon, Hato Arriba, Luyando, Aceitunas, La Playa, Espino, Juncal and Stella. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Aguada; Anasco; Lares; Las Marias; Moca; Rincon; San Sebastian
